name: Nuggetz
description:
Nuggetz is a reaction game for iOS and the Apple Watch (with Nuggetz Pro). It is based upon the Stroop effect. The task is easy: Just name the color in which a word is written, not the word itself. If you make a mistake the game is over.

Sounds easy? Just give it a try and play the game for free. Tell your friends to play it as well and find out, who can score the highest.

Nuggetz runs natively under watchOS, so you can play the game on your watch without the iPhone being paired.

Unfortunately, this game is not suitable for color-blind.
